html:
1.25.19  10:33 am   In the "history of the world", some jingles sound like you didn't sing to it. Do/is some of your jingles do not contain you (Bill Wurtz)?

     no

1.25.19  10:12 am   thoughts and feelings, about copyright laws?

     very complicated, but ultimately a blessing we don't deserve

1.25.19  8:44 am   what to do with life

     build a dam bridge

1.25.19  8:39 am   Should I worry about my future?

     take it a step further, worry about worrying

1.25.19  7:02 am   Should I change my name?

     sure

1.25.19  6:15 am   Do you ever think of Australia?

     yes

1.25.19  4:43 am   what is the correct amount of toothbrush to carry on a long long long journey?

     3

1.25.19  3:48 am   are you an alien from space?

     no

1.25.19  2:30 am   Should I study or procrastinate?

     how the heck do you procrastinate

1.25.19  1:14 am   happy birthday

     thank you

1.25.19  12:05 am   What is your favorite flavor of water?

     wet blast

1.24.19  11:30 pm   why not offset the schedule by a couple days so you don't feel like Tuesday Is the Day and I'm Screwed

     because then it would occur on a different day

1.24.19  10:51 pm  
does anything really exist at all

     sure

1.24.19  10:49 pm   okay but do you take drugs before writing your lyrics????

     the most important thing is that i do it with the music

1.24.19  10:35 pm   how can i be happy

     just try to act naturally

1.24.19  10:29 pm   how can i maintain optimism and keep up morale in the face of loss and tragedy?

     start making plans for the future

1.24.19  9:56 pm   what does FBI stand for

     fanboi

1.24.19  9:06 pm   How do you feel about the September 5th?

     ok

1.24.19  9:01 pm   Do you think that robots will take over the world and have better music than us?

      they would hardly be called robots anymore at that point but sure

1.24.19  8:53 pm   How do I succeed in life? 

     you could find a way to convert land-fills into real land

1.24.19  7:37 pm   I remember back around hotweig there was lots of discussion here on your video length. You said you now prefer medium length songs/videos over either short or long. Now that you've been doing these medium ones for many months do you have any plans to do videos under 30s or over 10 min again? 

     yes, but there are still many many many more possibilities within the :45 - 5:00 range

1.24.19  7:34 pm   Will you ever make a music video for "its gonna be alright" or "got to know whats going on"?

     yes

1.24.19  6:48 pm   As an aspirating musician myself, your songs truly inspire me. They're so wacky and fun and put a smile on my face any given day.

How did you end up becoming a song writer?

     songs are clearly a mystical magical power. it is irresistible to want to have those powers

1.24.19  6:40 pm   What electric guitar is that?

     i'm not sure

1.24.19  6:38 pm   How did you go from making music at as a hobby for yourself to wanting people to also hear it? Or did you always want that? 

     as soon as i felt i was good enough, i started wanting people to hear

1.24.19  6:22 pm   question 1: is this THE question?

     so far yes

1.24.19  6:09 pm   are we in a simulation? lol

     of what

1.24.19  4:47 pm   what do you think the human race as a whole is most afraid of?

     ruining our home planet before preparing any others

1.24.19  4:45 pm   do you play piano?

     yes

      and if so do u have any advice cause i just feel stuck at my level right now

     try to emulate some of your favorite song recordings, using just piano notes. this may require some simpification, but not much. it can be very fun. make sure you get it in the right octave, that's when it really starts to come alive

1.24.19  4:32 pm   What is the truth of the universe/.,

     it's you

1.24.19  4:09 pm   im in a group that is going to paint pictures of dogs for my local animal shelter and they only supplied us with pictures how do i turn it into a real dog, i don't have a spell powerful enough

     you must use your imagination

1.24.19  3:51 pm   do you consider music and content separate things creatively?

     one is the other, and one may contain the other

1.24.19  3:41 pm   what is it like being an introvert with a growing amount of fame?

     reasonable, if not sensible

1.24.19  3:38 pm   How do I make some time to do the cool things? By the time I get everything ready it's 11 o'clock pm or something.

     try to do the cool things first, then start the other things when it's almost too late

1.24.19  3:37 pm   how would you replicate the "out-out-out-outside" line-effect in a live setting (from "i wanna go outside")

     not

1.24.19  3:30 pm   What is the ideal amount of time to cook porridge

     that is different depening on which porridge you have and which heating device you have

1.24.19  3:29 pm   are you aware that if you type in "Bill Wurtz - topic" on YouTube dot com you get to listen to the latest Bill Wurtz song like 1 week earlier than everybody else?

     it depends whether everyone else is or is not using any of the music stores/streaming sites, and it would never be 1 week unless i fucked up drastically. normally it should be no more than 24 hours

1.24.19  2:57 pm   does an original work of art diminish in stature as it's copied and reproduced, or are copies of art equal to the original

     it depends on how good the copy method is

1.24.19  2:15 pm   I have a song without any melodies or lyric and I'm getting frustrated. What's your advice for writing a good melody? Thanks!

     think about the context the song will be existing in

1.24.19  1:54 pm   a creator i respect told me that everyone hates themselves at least sometimes. do you think this is true

     somewhat

1.24.19  1:13 pm   Favourite currency? 

     the gold nugget

1.24.19  12:17 pm   My friends are always mean to me and I really don't want to be around them but if I stop hanging out with them I am going to be all alone because nobody else wants to be friends with me. I don't know what to do. btw I'm putting this here to vent but if you do happen to see this and have any advice that would be nice.

     start doing some development on what kinds of things you would be doing and pursuing if you really had your choice. the more you start to develop that life, the more things will fall into place

1.24.19  12:05 pm   im in my SS class, and i highly doubt there is a reason to learn about the aftermath of WW1 and how they had lots of extra money, like,, sure its great they had fun but we know the great depression is right after so why wont we just skip over the spending splurge right to the GD? what is the point?

     the plot line needs to have those ups and downs. the great depression has to go in the context of the huge boom that came before. it's like a roller coaster. the downs would never happen without the ups

1.24.19  10:10 am   why does the video of long long long journey not have footage of you?

     to allow other things to take the focus

1.24.19  10:01 am   do unicorns haunt your dreams?

     not always

1.24.19  9:52 am   How do I type?

     so far you are doing great

1.24.19  8:20 am   what songs have you written in c major?

     i can hardly remember. it's been a long time since i have written in that key. actually 'best friends with my own front door' was written in C but i did it in D instead

1.24.19  6:58 am   Can you make something opposite of music?

     sure

1.24.19  3:37 am   do you see the glass as half-full or half-empty?

     that depends on its future

1.24.19  3:29 am   Why don't you update your instrumentals anymore?

     they are pretty much all there. except for one or two which have the wrong volume, and i've been meaning to re-export them and post them
